title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting money

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams and visions about collecting money Collecting money is necessary for real life, it can be praiseworthy in reality, it can be a bad omen in real life, as well as in reality as in dreams. You may also be interested in learning how to return a child in a dream, in the article we discuss the interpretation Seeing this symbol for more than one body for the dreamer and listing interpretations of dream interpretations and visions of collecting donations. Interpretation of seeing collecting banknotes in a dream indicates that the dreamer spends a lot of money, and God knows best. When you see collecting coins in a dream, it indicates his deviation from God and his shortcomings in religion. When you see collecting coins Money in general in a dream shows that he will have a lot of money in the coming days. Interpretation of dreams and visions about collecting money. Interpretation of seeing collecting money in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself in a dream collecting money from the ground, this means that she is satisfied and happy with her family. And this symbol in The dream means for a married woman that she will have a sincere and sincere friend, and God knows best. And if she sees that he is collecting money from the street, this is evidence of the formation of new relationships and good friendships. If he collects coins in a dream, this means that he will hear happy news in the future, and God knows best. If she collects money from On the street, this means that she will achieve all her ambitions and what she aspires to for herself. If she sees that she is taking money from a man, this indicates that her husband will get a prestigious job and actually earn a lot from it, and God knows best. If she dreams that she is collecting paper money, this means that she will face problems between her and her. And between her partner. See also: The play in the dream The play in the dream Interpretation of the vision of collecting money in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried woman collects money in a dream, this indicates her fear of what is to come, and God knows best. If she collects money from the ground in her dream, this indicates her engagement and marriage to a good person He will make her life happy soon. And if he collects a lot of gold, this is evidence that he has real estate, cars in the future, and other benefits of life, and God knows best. If she loses again what she was collecting in the dream, it is evidence of her failure and inappropriate choices and that she will miss a good opportunity in the future. If he sees that he is collecting money from the sea, this indicates that he will soon enter into a romantic relationship, but it will not be completed, and God knows best. See also: Symbols that indicate problems. Interpretation of seeing collecting money in a dream for a pregnant woman. If she dreams that she was collecting silver coins in her dream, this is a sign that the fetus A female, God willing. Even if it was gold coins, it is a sign that the newborn is a male by God’s command, and God knows best. If it were paper money, this would be evidence of the approaching date of her birth, by God’s command, with ease and comfort. If she sees that she is taking money from someone, this indicates However, she will receive a gift from every man she knows as soon as she is born, and God knows best. See also: Insulting religion in a dream. Interpretation of seeing collecting money in a dream for a man. If a person sees in his dream that he is collecting money and burning it, this indicates...

title: What is the interpretation and meaning of seeing forgiveness in a dream in full?

preview.html: Interpretation of tolerance in a dream is from the books of leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions, as well as through the Trend website, which specializes in interpretation sciences. Seeing tolerance in a dream is a vision that indicates gentleness and kindness. Comfort for the dreamer, and this is one of the praiseworthy visions, so we have collected for you, dear followers, all the details of what it means to see complete forgiveness in a dream for a single, married and pregnant woman, and even in the dreams of men. Why do you dream of asking for forgiveness by Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of forgiveness in a dream is complete from the visions about which the scholar Ibn Sirin said that This is evidence of comfort and freedom from worries. Also, seeing forgiveness in a dream indicates what is desired and liberates the dreamer from his problems and sorrows that he has suffered throughout his life. Seeing forgiveness in a dream indicates to the dreamer that he will achieve profit in his work and project and will collect a lot of money in the coming period. Asking for forgiveness. In a dream, it is complete and you do not want it, and many of them are evidence of kindness and blessings for the dreamer, as well as the appearance of many benefits for him. Why dream of asking for forgiveness in a dream of a single woman? The interpretation of asking for complete forgiveness in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she has removed her sadness and gotten rid of all her worries and sorrows. The method is In which she sees herself committing a sin and then asking for forgiveness, this indicates that she is suffering from a problem. Seeing forgiveness for an unmarried girl in a dream speaks of good behavior and good morals, because this is a testimony to faith. Interpretation of the vision of forgiveness for a married woman: Seeing a married woman praying and asking for forgiveness is evidence of her purity. Her sincerity and closeness to God Almighty, as well as a testimony to the protection of her home and her family from all harm. In addition, seeing a married woman asking for forgiveness in a dream is a sign of kindness and sufficient support for her and her husband, as well as for achieving many good things in their lives. In the case of a woman who is expecting pregnancy And she asks for forgiveness in a complete dream. This is a sign and good news that she will survive the pregnancy, ease the pain, and reduce the pain. Why dream of forgiveness for a pregnant woman in a complete dream? Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman asking for forgiveness in a dream is evidence of protection and escape from danger and an indication of the ease of her birth. Also, seeing a pregnant woman asking for forgiveness In her sleep, there is good news that she will give birth to the child she wants, whether male or female. Seeing a perfect person in a dream asking for forgiveness. Seeing a perfect person in a dream asking for forgiveness means repentance, getting closer to God, and abandoning all the dreamer’s sins. Tips for asking for forgiveness in a perfect dream. These are among the visions that indicate God’s response to the dreamer’s prayer, as it indicates that he occupies a high position and a high position in society. Fear and forgiveness in the dream. Fear and seeking forgiveness in the dream is a sign of the dreamer’s repentance for all the mistakes he has committed and evidence of God Almighty accepting repentance. Why do you dream of forgiveness and praise? Asking forgiveness and glorifying in the dream from Praiseworthy visions that indicate to the dreamer to eliminate his worries, because an unmarried young man is considered a harbinger of marriage. Why dream of the Master of Forgiveness? This vision may indicate that the dreamer will be able to visit the House of God

title: Interpretation of seeing forgiveness in a dream

preview.html: The Encyclopedia of Interpretation explains the interpretation of forgiveness in a dream in the context of interpreting the dreams that you have. Asking forgiveness is one of the acts of worship in the Islamic religion in which a Muslim asks for repentance from God for every sin he committed, intentionally or unintentionally, in an attempt to seek forgiveness from God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. He is asking for forgiveness. He is wondering about the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil. So we present a simplified interpretation of the interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream, according to what was narrated by the scholar Ibn Sirin. For unmarried girls, married women, pregnant women, and men as well. Interpretation of seeing forgiveness in a dream: Asking for forgiveness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that seeing someone asking for forgiveness for her is a good sign. This is good news to end worries, get rid of distress, and get rid of distress. It is also an indication of abundant sustenance and access to money at times, and sometimes it is a sign of the sleeper’s long life and brings happiness and lawful living in his life. Forgiveness in a dream for single peopleIf an unmarried girl sees that she is committing a sin, and after that she asks for forgiveness, this indicates problems That she will face in her life. But if he sees that he is hesitating to ask for forgiveness, this is a sign of the collapse of anxiety and the easing of anxiety. There is another interpretation that says that the girl who asks for forgiveness in her dream must be careful in making her decisions. Asking forgiveness of a married woman in a dreamWhen a married woman sees that she Asking for forgiveness in her dream is good news about happiness and the end of anxiety in her life. When a married woman sees herself asking for forgiveness while praying in a dream, this is a sign of the good news she is about to hear. When a married woman sees herself bowing and asking for forgiveness in a dream, this is a good vision. For her. In general, seeing a married woman asking for forgiveness is a vision of goodness and leads to the arrival of happiness and stability in her life. Forgiveness in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing forgiveness in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the safety of the health of the fetus and the safety of the mother as well. When a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is asking for forgiveness, This is a sign of an imminent birth. When you see a pregnant woman asking for her forgiveness in a dream, this indicates relief from the distress she is going through. Asking for forgiveness in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a male child or that her wish will be fulfilled regarding the type of fetus she wants. Asking for forgiveness in a dream About the man: Whoever sees in a dream that he is asking for forgiveness, this is evidence that he committed some sins, but he repents and repents for them. Seeing forgiveness in a dream for a man is a good omen that he is about to get something that he has long desired. When a person sees that he is saying the Lord’s request for forgiveness in A dream, then this is a sign of repentance and turning away from sins. As for a man who sees in his dream that he is asking for forgiveness in prayer, this is a sign of relief from anxiety and getting rid of worries. When a person sees that he is frequently asking God for forgiveness and praying urgently during his sleep, this is good news that he is a person Pious and honest. Seeing forgiveness in a dream is generally considered good news, death of sadness, and relief from grief. Rather, it contains evidence of the abundance of sustenance for the world.

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about brushing your teeth

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth is one of the things that many have asked about because there are no clear results for seeing something like this in a dream, which is what prompted us to collect all the interpretations given to us by many lawyers and dream interpreters, who are known for their honesty over time and we present them to you in this article, on I hope you like it and answer all your questions. Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth: Brushing your teeth in a dream is one of the daily things that we do to preserve our teeth and take care of them in a secret way, and this is what interpreters call us to introduce us to the effects of seeing brushing our teeth in a dream, which is what we do. I will show you below.If the dreamer sees that he is brushing his teeth in a dream, this symbolizes that he enjoys a good state of comfort, psychological stability, and understanding with his family members without any disturbances or problems that would disturb their peace or affect their relationship with each of them. One. However, while the girl who sees in her dream that she is brushing her teeth interprets this vision as a social person by nature, and seeks to create many relationships and friendships that will benefit her greatly in the future. Interpretation of the dream of brushing teeth by Ibn Sirin. The toothpick was one of the most important tools for cleaning teeth in the time of Ibn Sirin and by analogy with it. The interpretation of brushing teeth in a dream carries many connotations that we will explain to you as follows. While whoever sees in his dream that he is brushing his teeth with great force to clean them, he interprets this vision as committing a very great sin that made him rebuke his conscience and made him regret what he did. Drag him to the underworld. Secrets of Dream InterpretationThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, write a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google.Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is brushing her teeth interprets this vision as a good-looking person who takes care of herself and tries as much as possible to appear in the best possible condition for her and does not accept that she is like that. Less than it is. People know that she is clean and beautiful. While a girl who sees in her dream that she is brushing her teeth with great care without neglecting any part of herself, this means that she is a responsible person who does not exaggerate in any way in her duties and obligations and always takes responsibility for it. It weighs on her shoulders tirelessly or she feels bored to do it, which makes her trusted and relied upon by many. Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is particularly interested in brushing her teeth, this symbolizes the imminent pregnancy of a child she has always wished for. While A woman who sees herself in a dream brushing her teeth but they remain impure, then her vision indicates that she is suffering from many marital disputes, with her partner, and the problem is that they are being resolved in the wrong way. They have to talk a lot to each other until they come up with reasonable solutions to the crises they are experiencing in their relationship.Interpretation of a solution

title: What is the interpretation of a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The magic of a woman in a dream is one of the desired visions that give the dreamer a lot of happiness and joy. The supplications are among the short Qur’anic surahs that convey goodness to a person, whether in a dream or in reality. The magic of a woman in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is reciting magic in a dream, is going through a severe crisis, but he is strong. He does not give up easily, and at the same time he expects the law in all circumstances, and completely stays away from the forbidden. Means or illegal gain. Interpretation of seeing witches in a dream for a girl. She may suffer from a delay in her marriage and do not know the reasons for that. In the end, she learns that she was witched, but God Almighty saved her. From the evil of witches and envy, and soon grants her a good marriage. Also, seeing witches reading in a dream is one of the most promising visions and indicates the large number of applicants for unmarried women for her engagement or marriage to a religious man with good morals. Whoever sees in a dream that he is reading magic, then he A sign of resistance to Satan and his insinuations, as well as a righteous life full of religiosity and trust in God Almighty. Women’s Questions in a Dream by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees in a dream that he is reciting Women’s Shelters, this vision is a good dream, and evidence of freedom from vices, sorrows and worries, as well as from the evil of envy if he is jealous. As The vision indicates getting rid of all the problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life. As for the one who sees himself in a dream that he cannot read magic, then this is an unwanted dream, as it is evidence of worry and sadness and the dreamer’s affliction with envy or illness. Hatred and envy. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is reading Surat Al-Falaq and Surat Al-Nas in a dream, and the vision is evidence of her good condition and her freedom from evil and wickedness. The dream interpretation website on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write. Dream interpretation website on the Internet. Search Google it and get the correct interpretations. Women’s magic in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a woman reading “Al-Mu’awwa” in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that God is one, and he has no children. However, if she completes Surah Al-Ikhlas, she will receive a blessing from God and His greatest name, and He will respond to her and improve her conditions. Seeing witches in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of her immunity from any harm or harm and hatred of the souls around her. Reciting Surah Al-Fatihah, Al-Nas, or Al-Falaq for an unmarried girl is evidence of many things. It is a new development for her and the nearness of her blessed marriage. Witches in a dream for a married woman. Seeing witches in a dream for a married woman is a sign of her protection from evil eyes, haters, witches, her and the people of the house. Dreaming of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream is one of the dreams that may indicate goodness, as it is a sign of Justice and piety, as well as kindness and jurisprudence. Also, seeing the recitation of magic indicates the stability of a woman’s marital and family life, and is evidence of the husband’s love for his partner and the friendship that exists between them in reality, and God knows best. This dream also indicates that a married woman will not become pregnant and also shows repentance and avoiding sins and disobedience that Yer

Dreaming of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream is one of the dreams that may indicate goodness, as it is a sign of Justice and piety, as well as kindness and jurisprudence. Also, seeing the recitation of magic indicates the stability of a woman’s marital and family life, and is evidence of the husband’s love for his partner and the friendship that exists between them in reality, and God knows best. This dream also indicates that a married woman will not become pregnant and also shows repentance and avoiding sins and disobedience that Yer

title: Interpretation of a saw in a dream, a saw and an electric saw in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about cutting wood with a saw in the dream of a single girl and a married pregnant woman, buying a saw and cutting trees with a saw. Interpretation of a dream about a saw by Ibn Sirin: A saw in a dream is a man who takes, gives, and forgives, and he is a man with a big heart. A saw in a dream can symbolize a ruler or judge who rules on a certain matter. Whoever sees in his dream a saw cutting wood, this indicates his marriage or meeting the woman in his dream. Whoever dreams of a saw, this indicates a person with knowledge and wisdom. Whoever sees an ebony vision shows an authoritarian person. Whoever dreams of a marble saw, this symbolizes the palaces of heaven and his good conduct in life. Whoever dreams of using a saw, this indicates marital and family happiness in real life, but also indicates success and brilliance in professional life. Whoever dreams of a mechanical or electric saw, this means that he will have commercial experience. It is a great sign and he will succeed through it, especially on the financial level. If the dreamer is a woman, seeing a saw in a dream means that she will gain the respect of everyone around her and their great trust in her for her advice on personal matters. Whoever sees in a dream that the saw is broken or rusty, this is a sign of failure and painful accidents. And the painful thing that the dreamer or one of his relatives or friends may be exposed to. Whoever loses a saw in a dream, this indicates work that embarrasses the dreamer and leads him to failure and great loss. The ruler and the viewer appear, separating the two opponents and separating the spouses from all evil in his name. Perhaps it indicates the denominator and balance, and perhaps it indicates On the detestable, the glorious, the entrances of the hypocrites, and the spy on the wicked who commit evil. Perhaps the one who marries will make it clear to the People of the Book because he entered the firewood, and it was said that he is a man who takes, gives, and forgives. The saw in a dream is a man who takes, gives, and forgives, and the saw shows the ruler and the seer who separates the two adversaries. Perhaps it is an indication of Marriage by entering the firewood. Perhaps the saw represents division and separation between spouses. It indicates the balance, blessing, evil, and a spy on evil people. The saw is help, power, and livelihood. The saw of the oud is a man who is a world leader, and the ebony is a man who humiliates the Negroes. The marble saw shows the palaces of the sky, and the wood saw shows common people, such as grinding, sifting, and the like. The saw in a dream shows The ruler who separates rivals, the separator between spouses, and is a sign of division or justice, and the saw is the man who loves money and is also a symbol of effort at work. Interpretation of the saw in the dream of an unmarried woman. The saw in the dream of the unmarried woman shows someone who distinguishes between her and her family, and it is said That the young man has kindness and blessings, and it was said that in an unmarried woman’s dream he is her future husband. It was said that he is a traitorous friend...or achieves the desired goal. Interpretation of a saw in a married woman’s dream. A saw in a married woman’s dream indicates separation between the ruler or judge between her and her husband. Perhaps the saw showed rivalry or conflict, and perhaps it was bad news. A symbol of integrity, and perhaps a saw in a married woman’s dream indicates divorce. Interpretation of a saw in a pregnant woman’s dream. A saw in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child washing clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book Interpretation of Dreams that a vision of washing children’s clothes in a dream can herald the arrival of goodness. Also, a dream about washing a child’s clothes in a dream may indicate the collapse of fears and disagreements and may also indicate that the dreamer has He has reached a high position. Also, seeing a child’s clothes being washed in a dream can indicate happiness, pleasure, and good news that the dreamer will see in his next life. Interpretation of a dream of washing a child’s clothes in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she sees a child’s clothes being washed Washing them means that they will achieve their goals and aspirations for which they strive. Also, seeing a child being washed in a dream indicates the death of worries and transgressions and repentance to God Almighty, and God knows best. Also, seeing a child’s clothes being washed in a dream may indicate great excellence and success. What the girl has achieved and her entry into a new job. Seeing washing a child’s clothes in a dream may indicate the marriage of an unmarried girl to a good man who has a high status and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s clothes in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream a vision of washing new clothes for her child, This indicates the collapse of worries, problems, and disagreements that occur. Seeing a child’s clothes being washed in a dream may indicate the arrival of livelihood and a woman’s good treatment of her husband and obedience to his upcoming commands, and God knows best. Also, seeing a child’s clothes being washed in a dream may indicate good and righteous deeds and the pregnancy of a married woman. And the arrival of happiness. Interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a child’s clothes being washed, this indicates the disappearance of worries and problems, the ease of things, and the ease of birth. Also, seeing a child’s clothes being washed may indicate the birth of a child to a pregnant woman free of All diseases that may affect a family member. Interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s clothes in a dream for a man: Seeing a sweet man in a dream, seeing a child washing clothes, indicates the death of her worries and security, and that she will enter a new job. Also, seeing a child’s clothes being washed in a dream may indicate To merciful men, his close marriage to a good girl and marital happiness. Also, seeing a child’s clothes being washed in a dream may indicate the arrival of many good things and livelihoods, and it is a sign of reaping a lot of profits. A dream about washing a child’s clothes for a married man indicates the death of disputes that occur In the family and recovery from all diseases. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about figs: the meaning of eating figs in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about eating figs for a single woman for a pregnant woman from a married woman Dried figs from the tree Imam al-Sadiq fig Prickly pear I dreamed that I was picking figs Interpretation of figs in a dream Eating figs means offspring, children, and procreation, so if a single girl eats figs with joy, it may indicate marriage because this is the place of offspring. It is said that eating figs in a dream indicates sustenance and money for males and females, and this livelihood comes from a far away place such as Iraq or a region close to it. Some have said that eating black figs indicates sadness and grief over a forbidden act committed by the dreamer, and if he feels its sweet taste, then he will be saved from a conspiracy or Comfort for them and death of sadness. It is also said about the one who picked black figs and then ate them. With regard to green figs in a dream, they symbolize happiness, stopping worries, satisfying desires, and acquiring a lot of food and money, as long as the taste does not spoil or contain insects or worms, or whoever eats rotten green figs. As for the presence of insects or worms in What is involved in this is that if the fortune teller is good, there are people around him who are trying to deceive him, and if the fortune teller is a man or woman far from his religion, then he is cheating or seeking forbidden food or a forbidden relationship. Figs in a dream mean a lot of money, food, and abundance, and it is said that they are inherited. If someone is afflicted with them and enters his house, he becomes rich. It is said that he comes to his wife and does not sleep. With her, and it is said that the desire is still pending. Seeing figs in one dream without eating them shows that there are problems looming on the horizon. As for eating them, it indicates marriage or success and can show good and lawful money. If a married woman sees figs in her dream without eating or eating them, then she Witnessing severe psychological exhaustion. Figs in a dream for a pregnant woman indicate the birth of a male child, and if she sees him as beautiful, then her son is equal to the beauty and sweetness of figs in character and morals. Seeing a fig tree in a dream is a good omen in the dream, for a man has a good wife, and for a woman it is the year of fertility in which she gives birth or gets married. In which. Dedicated to a safe traveler or an immigrant country. Dried figs in a dream. Food is permissible and preserved. It was said: There is no objection to it, and it was said that the sick person has been cured. It has many connotations, especially for women. Eating figs in a dream is a benefit that affects the dreamer, and it is a benefit to him in his money and his family if he sees a married man in His dream was that he was eating figs from the tree, and his wife gave birth that year. As for the dream or the dreamer, perhaps the woman who asked for marriage was the best of her proposals, and if she asked for money, she would hit him and bless her with it. Interpretation of a dream about figs - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing white pages of the Holy Quran in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing the pages of the Holy Qur’an in white in a dream. It indicates the dreamer’s failure to perform the rituals imposed on him. It also symbolizes not learning or understanding matters of religion correctly, and expressing non-compliance with the instructions of religion and acting upon them. All of these signs are indicated according to what he sees. The dreamer in the article below. Interpretation of seeing the Holy Qur’an with empty pages. I mean, I see empty pages of the Holy Qur’an. Negligence and negligence in performing obligatory acts of worship. The vision indicates that the dreamer does not regularly perform religious rituals and duties. The vision symbolizes a wrong understanding of religious affairs. The dream indicates the dreamer’s distance from his Lord, He must approach Him by performing duties and responsibilities. The vision is a message to the dreamer to correct his actions and respect religious matters. Interpretation of a dream about the disappearance of verses from the Qur’an in a dream. See the warning. The disappearance of Quranic verses from the Qur’an. The dreamer is far from his Lord. The vision symbolizes failure to observe religious duties or perform them at the appropriate time. The vision emphasizes the The necessity of getting close to God, performing duties, and following the teachings of religion and the correct understanding of them. Vision after vision appears from God Almighty. The disappearance of Qur’anic verses in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her failure to fulfill her duties and that she must approach God and do good deeds. Interpretation of a dream about someone who gives me the Qur’an in a dream: Seeing someone He gives me a copy of the Qur’an. In a married woman’s dream, it means that she will give birth to good offspring. The vision predicts food, blessing, and great goodness that the dreamer will receive. The vision heralds alleviation of the dreamer’s financial situation and payment of debts. The dream suggests that you will start a new project with a friend and collect a lot of profits. Receive the Qur’an as a gift From someone in a dream means that you take something good and get it. The vision symbolizes that the dreamer will reach an excellent position at work after receiving a promotion. If a single woman sees this vision, this is a sign of the development of a good man for her, who will help her in her commitment. Interpretation of a dream about someone What tears the Qur’an in a dream. Seeing a torn Qur’an in a dream is a warning against dispersion and strife between family members. The vision shows disagreements between spouses that may lead to divorce, and God knows best. The dream indicates that the dreamer is far from his Lord and religion. The vision symbolizes exhaustion and hardship that the dreamer faces in order to earn a living. The vision is a message to the pioneer that he should pay attention to his future. Interpretation of a dream about a small Qur’an in a dream. I mean, I see a small Qur’an in a dream. Good things happen to him. The vision is good for what the dreamer gets of food and goodness, as well as for achieving the goals that he seeks to achieve. If the dreamer sees that he is carrying a Qur’an Small in a dream, this is a sign of the prestigious job that he will obtain. Putting the Qur’an in the pocket is evidence of the dreamer’s charity. Buying a small Qur’an in a dream is good news about a travel opportunity that the dreamer was waiting for to learn more about. A small Qur’an screen, for a person in a dream, is an indicator On the benefit it brings to others. Receiving the Qur’an as a gift is evidence of piety
